summary: REQ-1/2/3 appear implemented: a new `useEnsureUserRole` hook calls `actor.ensureUserRole()` once per authenticated principal (and again if principal changes), logs a single labeled debug message on failure, and Profile save errors now include backend-derived details with redaction. However, the diff summary also indicates multiple unrelated UI/content/styling/deployment changes not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Removal of legal notice alert and attestation checkbox from the Order page, plus other wording/content removals on Order Confirmation page
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ; BuildRequest is focused on ensureUserRole invocation and Profile save error feedback

hallucinated_features.description: Broad UI/admin page refactors (wrapping admin pages with AdminAccessGate, payment controls changes, toast notifications)
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ; changes go beyond ensuring #user role and Profile error messaging

hallucinated_features.description: Global styling/Tailwind/theme changes (OKLCH colors, typography scale, focus states, overflow-x guards; Tailwind config updates)
Addition of extensive deployment documentation and multiple new general-purpose frontend utilities/config files unrelated to the requested auth/role fix
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ (scope is auth/role bootstrap + Profile save feedback + debug logging)
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md, frontend/src/config.ts, frontend/src/utils/assetPaths.ts, frontend/src/utils/usStates.ts, frontend/src/utils/fileValidation.ts, frontend/src/components/SignaturePad.tsx entries)
